channel.title: CVE Feed for NI -- VeriStand
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NI -- VeriStand

item.title: CVE-2024-6791|2024-07-23T13:21:33.849Z -- ni -- veristand
item.description: A directory path traversal vulnerability exists when loading a vsmodel file in NI VeriStand that may result in remote code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to get a user to open a specially crafted .vsmodel file. This vulnerability affects VeriStand 2024 Q2 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-6793|2024-07-22T20:47:52.793Z -- ni -- veristand
item.description: A deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability exists in NI VeriStand DataLogging Server that may result in remote code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to send a specially crafted message. These vulnerabilities affect NI VeriStand 2024 Q2 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-6794|2024-07-22T20:50:40.727Z -- ni -- veristand
item.description: A deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability exists in NI VeriStand Waveform Streaming Server that may result in remote code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to send a specially crafted message. These vulnerabilities affect NI VeriStand 2024 Q2 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-6675|2024-07-22T20:01:15.981Z -- ni -- veristand
item.description: A deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability exists in NI VeriStand that may result in remote code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to get a user to open a specially crafted project file. This vulnerability affects VeriStand 2024 Q2 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-6791|2024-07-22T20:38:14.144Z -- ni -- veristand
item.description: A directory path traversal vulnerability exists when loading a vsmodel file in NI VeriStand that may result in remote code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to get a user to open a specially crafted .vsmodel file. This vulnerability affects VeriStand 2024 Q2 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-6806|2024-07-22T21:03:16.156Z -- ni -- veristand
item.description: The NI VeriStand Gateway is missing authorization checks when an actor attempts to access Project resources. These missing checks may result in remote code execution. This affects NI VeriStand 2024 Q2 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-6805|2024-07-22T21:00:21.584Z -- ni -- veristand
item.description: The NI VeriStand Gateway is missing authorization checks when an actor attempts to access File Transfer resources. These missing checks may result in information disclosure or remote code execution. This affects NI VeriStand 2024 Q2 and prior versions.
